name: Planetory
description:
You have crash-landed on an alien planet and your goal is to survive for as long as possible! Who knows, maybe your friends will find out you're gone and come looking for you?

To survive you must defend yourself against an endless ever-growing horde of angry alien wolves. As their number and toughness increase over time, you need to exploit the planet of its resources to research new technologies and grow more powerful.

Theme: Empty
Limitation: Make it a Roguelike
Created: 21-23 of January for the Mini Jam 98

Music: Slow Motion by bensound.com
Sound: Mixkit among other
